alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 3:48AM MST until December 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, with locally higher amounts possible over the highest elevations. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 4500 feet near Payson and Pine-Strawberry. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Slippery and snow covered roads could led to very difficult travel across the high terrain. Areas of patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility at times. Hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. Snow forecast from 11 PM Today to 11 PM Tuesday: Payson 4 to 8 inches Pine-Strawberry 7 to 11 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
